mehi di un wahanse, shri lankawe pawathina aagamika sahajiwanaya saha aagamika washayen beduna pasal kramaye aadinawa penwa dunneya.esema aagamika shasthaෲwarunge iganwimwalata pitin yamin wiwidha nikaya,kalli, kandayam hadagena ada ema aagamika iganwim wikruthi kara aththe, pasukalina aagamika nayakayan bawada, rajek rata palanaya kala yuththe keseda yanna dharmashoka rajathumage dasaraja dharmayen penwa di athi bawada un wahanse penwa dunha.

lankawe inna koti 2n ek koti anu lakshayakatama jangama dukek siti.etharam pirisak athara jangama duka prasiddha wi aththe durin inna thamange hithawathekuta katha kirimata haki nisayi.thawaduratath jangama duka pashan ekak yayi sithannata ape kollo kello modayin wanne natha.ehenam ape adikaram thuma hari apuru tharkayak geneyi.pawule hathara denagen amma thaththa wena wenama rakiya karana wita putha duwa wena wenama tiyushan panthi yanakota hathara denata pon hatharak oone nadda?mase awasaneta undalata telipon bilata hariyanna eetath wadiyen maligawe bhanadagaren gewana hinda samahara wita unnahe hithanna athi ee bilen bhagayakwath samanya janathawa maseta wiyadam karana waya kiyala.ee kohoma wethath meda arilla ariyoth wadinne aadare suwa windina pemwathunge mal kadillataya.me langadi eka paratama jangama dukek athulen mayitawek mathu uneya.ithiri ek koti asu nawa laksa namasiya anu nawayen ekakawath mayita inna bawa wartha une natha.ape rate aththo ee niwus eken hondatama bayawuna bawanam suwarya.duka mayita pon ekata giye ibetama da ehema naththam kawuru hari yawwada kiya sitha baliya yuthu thathwayak dan udawi atha.ape rate minissunge prashna amathaka karana kusa paba,ayi pi el ,sarath ponseka maddata mayitawek pamina atha.

rathnapura disthi්rakkaye kolonna korale kelawara panamuraya asala kala pedesaka pasalaka mul guru yuwalak ha guruwarayek sewaya keloya.watup ganima sandaha sathapum thunahamarak pamana pa gamanin gewa basayakata naga sathapum hayak pamana dura thapal kanthoruwata ya yuthuya.melesin upa guru sama masayakama watup laba ganimata ya yuthuya.dinak padipatha athsan karawa gena pan mallak da gena me guruwaraya kala paren sathapum thuna hamarak gaman kara basayakata nagi thapal kanthoruwa kara giyeya.mehi athsan kala watup patha thapal mahathata di mudal labagena dakunu kakule kelawara mudal thaba honda redi patiyakin banda gaththeya.asala kadayakin karawala kuriyakuth elawalu tikak miladi gena basayakata nagini.
